article:
Some default Owl annotations are parsed by the browser. These annotations on elements (Class, Property, or Individual) are:
owl:versionInfo allows to add some information about the current version of the element
rdfs:comment allows to add comments on the element to document it
rdfs:seeAlso point to additional resources to explain the element
rdfs:isDefinedBy point to additional resources to define the element
The comments are shown as tooltips on elements (Class, Property, or Individual).
The "Show Commented Elements" property in the allow to show in the tree the elements which have comments:
